ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Run a response play
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Run a response play
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Run a specified response play on a given incident.
Response Plays are a package of Incident Actions that can be applied during an Incident's life cycle.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#response-plays)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Run a response play

Run a specified response play on a given incident. Response Plays are a package of Incident Actions that can be applied during an Incident's life cycle. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#response-plays)

Method: Post

OperationID: runResponsePlay

EndPoint:

/response_plays/{response_play_id}/run
